headline: A Look at Serve Robotics's Valuation After DoorDash Partnership and $100M Equity Raise
summary: Serve Robotics (SERV) is generating buzz after announcing a $100 million registered direct equity offering to institutional investors, just days after securing a multi-year partnership with DoorDash for nationwide autonomous robot deliveries. These moves are drawing investor focus because they reflect expanded capital flexibility and broader commercial growth in the autonomous delivery sector. See our latest analysis for Serve Robotics. Serve Robotics has had a whirlwind few weeks, expanding...
